reviewText:
Not too bad, a lot of the videos are grainy and the recording quality isn't that amazing.. but it's still a good thing to have for fans of harder music. A lot of the bands aren't actually hardcore, just so we get that through.
Some bands included are:
Maylene and the sons of disaster
The Chariot
As Cities Burn
Showbread
Heavy Heavy Low Low
Remembering Never
Scarlet
Twelve Gauge Valentine
... so on and so forth.
